org.apache.hadoop.hbase.zookeeper

类 ZNodePaths

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.zookeeper.ZNodePaths

  • @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class ZNodePaths
extends Object
    Class that hold all the paths of znode for HBase.

      • isClientReadable

        public boolean isClientReadable(String node)
        Returns whether the znode is supposed to be readable by the client and DOES NOT contain sensitive information (world readable).

      • joinZNode

        public static String joinZNode(String prefix,
                               String suffix)
        Join the prefix znode name with the suffix znode name to generate a proper full znode name.

        Assumes prefix does not end with slash and suffix does not begin with it.

        参数:
        prefix - beginning of znode name
        suffix - ending of znode name
        返回:
        result of properly joining prefix with suffix
